example.eg: I have a German test today; I hope I get good results.
example.egtrans: 我今天有个德文考试，希望能考好。

example.eg: The scientists are going to run their tests.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 实验, 试验, 试验

example.eg: The scientists plan to run a final test on the rocket at the end of the month.
example.egtrans: 科学家打算在这个月底进行最后一次火箭实验。

example.eg: The sensors will test the strength of the fibres.
example.egtrans: 探测器会测出各种纤维的强度。

example.eg: The doctor tested Mark for TB.
example.egtrans: 医生检测马克是否患上了结核病。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 检测，因为…而对…进行化验

example.eg: The teacher tested the students on what they had learnt that term.
example.egtrans: 老师对学生们进行了当期所学知识方面的测试。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 对…进行…方面的测试, 考查…对于…方面的知识

example.eg: I want to test the program today to see if it works.
example.egtrans: 我今天想测测这个程序，看它是否能用。

example.eg: Neil is having his urine tested for various disorders.
example.egtrans: 他正在做尿检，看有哪些异常。

example.eg: The test of a good athlete is discipline.
example.egtrans: 对一名运动员是否优秀的判断标准是纪律性。

example.eg: England performed well in today's test against India.
example.egtrans: 在今天对抗印度的各国家队之间的比赛中，英国表现出色。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 决赛期间各国家队之间的比赛

dsense.name: test
dsense.guideword: (shell of some invertebrates) (某些无脊椎动物)

example.eg: The sea squirt larva is covered in a test.
My brother always tests well.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 取得考试成绩, 测得结果

example.eg: The long wait tested Jessica's patience. The realisation that the project was more difficult than he had thought tested Tim's resolve.
example.egtrans: 漫长的等候考验着杰西卡的耐心。意识到这个项目比想象中的要困难许多，这考验着提姆的决心。

example.eg: I think I'll test out this new floor polish.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 充分检验, 充分考验

example.eg: She performed at the 95th percentile on the math achievement test.
The acid test in becoming a good cook is making a perfect soufflé.

dsense.name: alpha test
dsense.guideword: (software: first trial) (计算机，对软件制品的初级测试)

example.eg: Aptitude tests suggest that I should be a gardener or an archaeologist.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 能力测试, 能力倾向测试

example.eg: Although participants in a beta test get new software before anyone else, they must accept that it may not work properly.

dsense.name: beta test [sth]
dsense.guideword: (software: trial again) (电脑硬件、软件发行上市前的试用)

example.eg: The company is looking for volunteers to beta test the software upgrade.
His blood test showed a high cholesterol level.
example.egtrans: 血液检测显示他的胆固醇很高。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 血液试验, 验血, 查血

dsense.name: breath test
dsense.guideword: (law: to check alcohol level) (测试酒精含量)

dsense.name: breath test [sb]
dsense.guideword: (law: test alcohol level) (测试酒精含量)

example.eg: We will use a chi-square test to see if the actual statistical distribution fits the theoretical distribution.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 完形填空, 填空测验

example.eg: An MRI is an example of a diagnostic test.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 诊断测试, 诊断检查
尿液检查试纸, 试纸条

example.eg: Gina failed her driver's test several times before finally passing.
At the Olympics, athletes must undergo a drug test to check that they have not consumed performance-enhancing drugs.
You don't need to take another driving test to renew your license, you just have to take an eye exam to prove to the inspector that you can still see well enough to drive.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 高挥发性的，高度挥发性的

example.eg: In the past, all school students had to take an intelligence test.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 侧向流动检测, 测流抗原测试

example.eg: All students have to pass a basic literacy test before they can be accepted onto the course.

dsense.name: litmus test
dsense.guideword: (test for acidity or alkalinity) (酸碱度测试)

example.eg: After the means test his application for unemployment benefits was denied.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 经济状况调查, 财力调查
医学检查，医学检验，医疗检验

example.eg: Oral tests are an alternative to written exams in a variety of subjects.
The students had to prepare for an oral test to demonstrate their conversational Spanish.

dsense.name: pap smear, Pap smear, pap test, Pap test

example.eg: A personality test can tell you something about yourself.

dsense.name: placement examination, placement exam, placement test

example.eg: Many schools require a placement examination in order to decide which program is best for the student.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 评估考试, 入学分级考试

example.eg: We give all incoming freshmen a placement test to see what level math they should start at.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 安置考试, 入学分级考试, 评估测试

example.eg: She passed her theory test but failed the practical test.
Chris and Laura could hardly breathe as they waited for the results of the pregnancy test.
example.egtrans: 克里斯和劳拉急切地等待着妊娠测试结果，几乎无法呼吸。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 怀孕测试, 妊娠测试, 考验, 经受检验

dsense.name: road test
dsense.guideword: US (test of vehicle in use) (为检测车辆安全性等的)

example.eg: The article reports results from the road tests of three new cars.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 完好性检查, 合理性检验

example.eg: Actors' screen tests are enjoyable to watch because they show the first reading of a script.
Spending the winter in the mountains was a severe test of their determination.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 子宫颈涂片检查, 巴氏涂片检查
拼写考试, 拼写测验
经得起时间的考验，持久

dsense.name: standardized test, also UK: standardised test

example.eg: The SAT is a standardized test that is widely used for college admissions.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 标准考试, 标准测试

example.eg: I have to take a test in biology next week.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 结核病检验, 结核病筛查

dsense.name: test case
dsense.guideword: (court case that sets a precedent) (法律)

example.eg: Something went wrong during the test flight and the plane crashed.
Some unscrupulous students got hold of the test papers before the exam and sold them.
The TV stations used to end their broadcast day by displaying a test pattern.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 测试图案，测试图形, 测试模式

dsense.name: test pilot
dsense.guideword: ([sb] who flies aircraft to trial them)

example.eg: Out of all the patients screened for the virus, only 20% tested positive.
Rory took his race car to the track for a test run.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 试管的, 试管培育的

example.eg: Test-tube babies are common these days.
I did quite well on the vocabulary test.
The exam consists of three written tests and one oral.
